entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023
